property.title: Modern 4-Bedroom Villa with Pool
property.description: This stunning 4-bedroom villa, located in the serene neighborhood of Riviera Palmeraie, offers the perfect blend of modern luxury and family comfort. Designed by the renowned KOF Builders, this home features spacious living areas, high-end finishes, and a private swimming pool, all within a secure and tranquil environment. Enjoy easy access to local amenities whilst residing in one of Cocody's most sought-after locations.

highlights.pool: Private swimming pool with modern deck
highlights.living: Spacious open-plan living and dining area
highlights.master: Master suite with walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom
highlights.proximity: Proximity to international schools and shopping centers

property.locationDesc: Located in the prestigious Riviera Palmeraie neighborhood of Cocody, this property offers excellent connectivity to major business districts, international schools, and shopping centers. The area is known for its secure environment and well-maintained infrastructure.
property.developerDesc: KOF Builders is a renowned construction company in Côte d'Ivoire with over 15 years of experience in delivering high-quality residential and commercial properties. Known for attention to detail and commitment to excellence.

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.description: Q Homes is dedicated to revolutionizing the real estate experience in Côte d'Ivoire. Our mission is to provide a transparent, secure, and seamless platform that connects the global Ivorian diaspora and foreign investors with verified, high-quality properties. We envision a future where everyone can confidently invest in their dream home or property, backed by trust and excellence.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about our services and processes.
faq.q1: What types of properties does Q Homes specialize in?
faq.a1: Q Homes specializes in a wide range of properties in Côte d'Ivoire, including luxury villas, modern apartments, and commercial spaces. We cater to various needs, from long-term rentals to sales for both locals and expatriates relocating to the country.
faq.q2: How does Q Homes verify property listings?
faq.a2: We have a rigorous verification process. Our team conducts on-site visits, checks legal documentation and ownership titles (ACD - Arrêté de Concession Définitive), and ensures all listings meet our high standards for quality and safety. This guarantees that you are viewing legitimate, high-quality properties.
faq.q3: Do you offer relocation assistance for international clients?
faq.a3: Yes, we provide comprehensive relocation services. This includes helping you find the perfect home, assisting with administrative paperwork, and offering insights into life in Abidjan. Our goal is to make your move to Côte d'Ivoire as smooth and stress-free as possible.
faq.q4: What are the typical fees associated with renting or buying?
faq.a4: For rentals, standard fees usually include one month's rent for the agency fee, a security deposit (typically 2 months' rent), and the first month's rent in advance. For purchases, fees include notary fees and our agency commission, which are calculated based on the property's value. We ensure full transparency on all costs upfront.

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Dream Home?
cta.subtitle: Take the next step in your journey. Our portfolio of exceptional properties is waiting for you.
